backend/main.mo: Defines core types, storage maps, access control, user profiles, and report structures for the backend canister.
feature_evidence.json: Lists features, related files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels for implemented functionality.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short descriptions of various frontend files and their roles in the application.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining OKLCH color tokens and theme variables for light/dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point loading the React app and setting PWA-related metadata.
frontend/LIVE_INTEGRATION_RESTART_RUNBOO: Runbook detailing steps for restarting and validating a clean live integration workflow.
frontend/PHASE3A_READONLY_FRONTEND_NOCHA: Explains that Phase 3a requires no frontend changes and documents verification and reasoning.
frontend/PRODUCTION_BUILD_VERIFICATION.m: Checklist for validating production builds including cleanup, core functionality tests, and i18n checks.
frontend/public/404.html: SPA fallback page that redirects known routes back to the app shell.
frontend/public/data/public-contact-look: Static lookup table for known public phone and email contacts with metadata.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app identity, icons, colors, and launch settings.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker implementing precaching and a network‑first strategy with offline fallback.
frontend/PWA_WEBAPK_ANDROID_TEST.md: Checklist for confirming Android Chrome generates a real WebAPK installation.
frontend/scripts/live-integration-comple: Wrapper script that runs the restart integration script and emits a single success line if valid.
frontend/scripts/restart-live-integratio: Script performing clean build preparation, dependency checks, builds, and verification for production integration.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application wiring routing, providers, consent gate, and service worker registration.
frontend/src/backend.idl.ts: IDL definition exposing a single analyzeText canister method.
frontend/src/components/AdvancedContactL: Component handling contact analysis flow, including type detection, public lookup, caching, and offline behavior.
UI card displaying detailed analysis results, risk scoring, public info, and reporting options.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Responsive app layout with header, navigation, mobile menu, language selector, auth controls, and routing integration.
frontend/src/components/AuthControl.tsx: Authentication UI that shows login button or user profile menu based on Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/components/CollaborativeRes: Displays collaborative lookup results with risk score, categories, report count, and error/empty states.
frontend/src/components/ConsentGateModal: Modal requiring users to accept cookies and terms before proceeding, with links to policy pages.
frontend/src/components/CookieStorageSet: Dialog showing stored data categories and allowing users to clear local history and cached data.
frontend/src/components/DashboardQuickAc: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer showing copyright text and external partner seals with links.
frontend/src/components/InstallButton.ts: Button to trigger PWA installation and show an alert if installation is not available.
frontend/src/components/InternationalCon: Displays an international contact's risk, scores, country validation, and trust info with icons and badges.
frontend/src/components/LanguageSelector: Provides a dropdown to switch application languages using the i18n provider.
frontend/src/components/PublicEntitySeal: Shows official seals for Portugal, USA, and EU with links and icons grouped by region.
frontend/src/components/PublicLocationRe: Renders public location search results with fixed low risk, showing entity details and handling errors or empty states.
frontend/src/components/PwaInstallAction: Button component that triggers the PWA installation flow via a helper function.
frontend/src/components/ReportSubmission: Dialog for submitting lookup reports with category selection, description, anonymity info, and success/error states.
frontend/src/components/StructuredAnalys: Displays structured fraud analysis with risk level, explanation, recommendation, and source links.
frontend/src/components/TermsContent.tsx: Renders a terms-of-service page using i18n content, mapping sections into cards and optionally showing public entity seals.
frontend/src/components/TermsModal.tsx: Displays TermsContent inside a dialog with scrollable content and localized title.
Shows user identity info, cookie settings, and activity history with actions to clear it.
frontend/src/config/features.ts: Defines feature-flag interface, defaults, and helpers for checking PRO and external provider availability.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdvancedContactLoo: Manages localStorage-backed caching of contact lookup results with add, retrieve, and clear utilities.
frontend/src/hooks/useAntiFraudActors.ts: Initializes and tracks main, extra, and reports canister actors and logs a readiness report once.
frontend/src/hooks/useConsentGate.ts: Handles persisted consent state, requiring re-consent when the terms version changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternationalConta: Provides a lookup method using the backend actor and returns detailed or fallback contact data.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity auth state, initialization, login, logout, and context access.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsAdmin.ts: Checks admin status via actor.isAdmin using react-query and returns isAdmin and loading state.
frontend/src/hooks/useOfflineStatus.ts: Tracks browser online/offline status and exposes isOnline and isOffline flags.
frontend/src/hooks/usePublicLocationSear: Provides a search function for public locations with loading, result, and error state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitLookupReport: Submits lookup reports to the backend canister and manages submission loading, success, and error states.
frontend/src/hooks/useTermsDocument.ts: Fetches the current terms document via actor.getCurrentTerms with react-query and exposes loading and error states.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Loads and updates per‑user profile history in local storage based on Internet Identity principal.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx: Provides language state, session persistence, and translated strings with Portuguese fallback.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Defines supported languages and translation strings with Portuguese as the base definition.
frontend/src/ic/actors.ts: Creates IC HTTP agents and typed actors for the main, extra, and reports canisters.
frontend/src/ic/canisterIds.ts: Exports static canister IDs and a helper to retrieve them by type.
frontend/src/ic/idl/extra.idl.ts: Defines Candid IDL and TypeScript interface for extra canister phone and crypto report queries.
frontend/src/ic/idl/main.idl.ts: Defines IDL and interface for the main canister’s analyzeText method.
frontend/src/ic/idl/reports.idl.ts: Defines IDL and interfaces for submitting reports and performing lookup queries across multiple report types.
frontend/src/ic/readinessReport.ts: Generates and logs a readiness report showing canister IDs and available actor methods.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for light/dark themes, plus global styles and accessibility rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global CSS.
frontend/src/pages/AdminTermsPage.tsx: Admin interface for viewing and updating terms of service, with validation, loading states, and permission checks.
frontend/src/pages/DocumentationPage.tsx: Documentation page that displays sections and triggers PDF generation with loading feedback.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page offering multiple fraud‑analysis tools for messages, emails, phone numbers, and crypto with tabbed UI.
frontend/src/pages/HowItWorksPage.tsx: Explains verification methods and scoring via accordion sections with localized text.
frontend/src/pages/InternationalContactS: Provides international contact lookup with validation, normalized input handling, and backend search integration.
frontend/src/pages/MissionPage.tsx: Renders the mission page with vision, mission, impact, and values sections using i18n text and SEO setup.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPage.tsx: Displays the privacy policy with multiple dynamic sections and sets page SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/TermsPage.tsx: Sets SEO metadata and renders the TermsContent component.
frontend/src/pwa/install.ts: Handles PWA install prompt capture and exposes functions to trigger installation.
frontend/src/router/useSimpleRouter.ts: Implements a minimal client-side router with custom navigation events and state syncing.
frontend/src/search/publicLocationSearch: Detects public‑location queries and fetches matching entities from OSM Nominatim with normalization and parsing.
frontend/src/utils/antifraudTextNormaliz: Provides text‑normalization utilities and keyword/phrase matching and counting helpers.
frontend/src/utils/contactInputHeuristic: Detects, normalizes, and validates phone and email inputs with basic heuristics and localized errors.
Builds a structured Portuguese documentation object with branding, institutional pages, terms, privacy, and an appendix using translation data.
frontend/src/utils/emailHeuristics.ts: Implements deterministic email risk checks based on domains, TLDs, typosquatting, randomness, and format to classify emails as safe or flagged.
frontend/src/utils/generateDocumentation: Generates a downloadable text-based documentation file by assembling content from the documentation generator and creating a browser-side file download.
frontend/src/utils/highRiskPhrases.ts: Defines high- and medium‑risk phrase patterns used to detect fraud indicators in messages through fragment matching.
frontend/src/utils/localRateLimit.ts: Provides a simple localStorage‑based cooldown system to limit report submissions and track remaining wait time.
frontend/src/utils/messageCriticalTrigge: Lists critical high‑risk trigger phrases that immediately elevate message fraud risk across financial, urgency, threat, and impersonation themes.
frontend/src/utils/messageHeuristics.ts: Scores message text for fraud risk using keyword weights, crypto patterns, links, punctuation, and casing to produce a risk level.
frontend/src/utils/phoneCountry.ts: Maps phone numbers to countries by matching leading E.164 codes after normalization, returning 'Unknown' when unmatched.
frontend/src/utils/publicContactLookup.t: Loads and caches a same-origin JSON dataset to look up public contact info by normalized phone or email keys.
frontend/src/utils/publicSourceProviders: Checks public-source presence using the local dataset and prepares for future external providers, returning matched sources and info.
frontend/src/utils/riskScoring.ts: Computes a weighted 0-100 fraud risk score and maps numeric scores to Low/Medium/High levels.
frontend/src/utils/riskWeights.ts: Defines default risk scoring weights and thresholds and exports them as a shared configuration object.
frontend/src/utils/seo.ts: Sets the document title and optionally updates the meta description for SEO consistency.
frontend/src/utils/structuredFraudAnalys: Implements a heuristic fraud analysis engine combining keyword rules, scoring, and templates to produce structured risk results.
frontend/src/utils/translateBackendResul: Performs dictionary-based translation of backend Portuguese analysis text into other languages without altering meaning.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using both query strings and hash routing.
frontend/src/utils/userProfileStorage.ts: Manages user profiles and history in localStorage, including saving, loading, and clearing user-related data.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS with custom colors, typography, animations, and container settings for the frontend.
project_state.json: Tracks project phase, architectural notes, existing features, and new feature requests for a frontend-only public‑location search using OpenStreetMap Nominatim. Specifies constraints like no backend changes, UI restructuring, or scoring‑engine modifications.
